title: Bug 13620: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page displays excessive white space, causing a visual inconsistency with other sections.
OB: Upon navigating to the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, the text is scattered with a noticeable amount of white space, creating a less-than-ideal visual presentation.
EB: The text on the Java Source Attachment Preference Page should align consistently with the layout of other sections, appearing at the top without unnecessary white space.
SR:
1. Open the Java Source Attachment Preference Page.
2. Observe the excessive white space around the text.
3. Compare with other sections to note the inconsistency.
